entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 10 except plus 5 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
